abstract: Simple ways to make sure your wireless data doesn't fall into the wrong hands.
snippet: Simple ways to make sure your wireless data doesn't fall into the wrong hands.
lead_paragraph: When you use a Wi-Fi connection to access the Internet, the data you transmit flies through the air. This allows us to remain blissfully connected while wandering through the house with a laptop, in a hotel with a tablet or in a departure lounge with a smartphone, but it also comes with privacy and security risks.
